item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-07-10
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Zaftigs Delicatessen (335 Harvard St, Brookline). #
  • RT: FictFact has made it into round 2 of @masschallenge! We'll be pitching to the judges next week, wish us luck! (via @fictfact) #
  • I'm at Starbucks (1154 Boylston St, Hammond St, Chestnut Hill). #
  • I'm at Tango Mango Taqueria (1191 Centre St, Newton). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
